Harry Krantz Company For Complete Electronic Component Solut

With their first commitment to customer satisfaction and quality assurance they meet the highest standards of their customers' most demanding requirements. With their in-depth product knowledge and commitment to applying the Of all the things that cannot be bought, experience is most important and enduring. With more than 70 years of providing program support as a supplier of hard to find electronic components to defense, aerospace and industrial manufacturing, Harry Krantz Company, an ISO 9001-2000 AS9100 certified company, has more than enough experience to adapt to the dynamic environment of the current business climatemost stringent standards of quality and authenticity to all of their processes Harry Krantz Company consistently provides solutions to the most challenging inventory driven problems of their customers. With more than 700,000 in-stock line items of obsolete electronic components and hard to find electronic components in their electronic component inventory they have access to the most critical material from the most qualified suppliers
Harry Krantz Company supplies the most critical military electronic components to an extensive list of tier one customers. Their vast electronic component inventory consists primarily of DMS, hard to find electronic components and obsolete electronic components, which have been acquired directly from US based defense and aerospace contractors as excess inventory. With a commitment to zero tolerance for error in supplying electronic components to military and aerospace related programs Harry Krantz Company applies a highly stringent 30-point inspection to al incoming product. All military electronic components are inspected in an ESD controlled environment and are handled by a staff trained according the requirements of our AS9100 quality system before being processed for fulfillment or stock. As a leading electronic component distributor , Harry Krantz ensures that all components meet the most stringent requirements of authenticity.
If you are looking for hard to find electronic components go to www.harrykrantz.com with an extensive stock of obsolete electronic components that has been purchased as excess inventory from a highly qualified vendor base, they have an electronic component inventory where you will find what you are looking for. Their inventory has been compiled over years from manufacturers selling excess inventory or consignment. Their entire inventory is housed in their modern 75,000 square foot facility based in Edgewood, NY. If you are looking to sell or consign excess electronic inventory, please contact the Harry Krantz company. One of their trained representatives can discuss with you the advantages of partnering with the Harry Krantz Company and the ways that you can maximize revenue from you your excess and residual inventory. With extensive market knowledge they can return the best price that the market will bear for residual inventory that is currently in your possession.
Harry Krantz Company is known for meeting its customer requirements. Their ability to provide qualified electronic components delivered directly from their stock is un-paralleled. It is this commitment to customer satisfaction that makes them one of the most relied upon electronic parts suppliers in the world. Industries ranging from medical to telecommunications, defense and aerospace return to Harry Krantz for their integrity and friendly, professional manner with which their team of trained professionals delivers customer satisfaction.
For all your industrial electrical supplies and detailed information about various electronic components offered by Harry Krantz Company visit www.harrykrantz.com

Choose Reliable Electronic Component Distributors For Certif

Electronic components have become the heart and soul of every modern industry as well as household appliance. Every electronic goods manufacturer needs the advice and services of distributors of electronic components to not only fulfill their commitments in time but also for ensuring the smooth running of the various electronic appliances and gadgets that have become a vital part of human existence. As such there is an unending demand for reliable and trustworthy electronic component distributors across the globe. However, to facilitate longer life for our appliances and gadgets it is important to use only certified components, which can only be obtained form a trustworthy distributor.

Given the availability of wide range of components that can be used for a single purpose, one can easily be misled into using an ordinary or substandard component in an expensive gadget or appliance. This can cause irreparable damage to the gadget or appliance resulting in great monetary loss. To avoid such a situation, it is advisable to purchase only certified components that come with a warranty from a reputed distributor of electronic components. Although such components might be a bit expensive, you can be certain that they will not cause any harm to the appliance or gadget in which you will be using them.

Purchasing form a reliable electronic component distributors generally also ensure that you get better after sales services. In most cases the distributor might even offer free replacement of a component that turns out to be defective or does not work properly.

Harry Krantz Company is one of the leading electronic component suppliers that can offer you a wide range of electronic components in ready stock. They have over 700,000 in-stock units of obsolete, hard-to-find and end-of-life components. With an experience of over 7 decades and a global presence they can prove to be a right partner in the growth of your company. To know more about Harry Krantz Company, one of the top and dependable electronic component distributors and various products and services offered by them logon to: http://www.harrykrantz.com

Important Considerations For International Electronics

Having an international market presence is the dream of every businessman. However, capturing the international market is not that easy and can be done only by adhering to the international standards of your particular business. The rule is especially true for electronic component distributers, who intend to take their business to an international level. Given below are some important things that distributors of electronic components need to ensure for achieving success in the international market.
It is important to manage finances deftly, keeping in mind the fluctuations in international currency. Distributers need to clearly put across the terms of payment to international clients as the currency values might greatly vary from the time of placing of order till the actual delivery of products. Having good banking relationships is also vital for sustaining business.
Distributers also need to have an in-depth knowledge of the various customs procedures as well as the shipment costs of delivering the products to international clients. They need to be well aware of the associated paperwork, filling of forms, alternate shipment options and hoards of other issues. Getting well acquainted with the delivery systems of the countries they deal with is also a wise decision that can prove highly beneficial for their business.
It is also important for international electronic component distributors to ensure the provision of good technical support to international clients on a round the clock basis. Having a strong technical support team ensures that all the technical queries of the customers are attended to in a satisfactory manner.
Harry Krantz Company is one of the leading electronic component suppliers that can offer you a wide range of electronic components in ready stock. They have over 700,000 in-stock units of obsolete, hard-to-find and end-of-life components. With an experience of over 7 decades and a global presence they can prove to be a right partner in the growth of your company. To know more about Harry Krantz Company, one of the top and dependable electronic component distributors and various products and services offered by them logon to: http://www.harrykrantz.com/

How To Select The Right Electronic Component Supplier?

A dependable electronic component suppliers is very important for running successful electronic goods manufacturing company. Manufactures are on the look for a reliable and affordable electronic component provider who can provide them with top quality components. A good electronic component provider can understand your concerns and can provide fast and effective solutions with dependable delivery.

If you are on the look for a reliable electronic component provider, here are a few factors that you should consider:

• Before zeroing on any one distributor, make sure that the components provided by the provider are of high quality. A good provider has an in-house quality testing system for all the components to make sure that all the provided components are of premium quality.
• It is important to check the provider for a vast inventory of all types of components. This will ensure that you will avail components at a short notice. Also, ensure that the supplier has the ability to deliver the component within 48 hours to any part of the country.
• You should consider the employer for timely delivery of electronic parts. There is no place for delays in today’s competent world. So, availability of desired components to you in a timely manner is very important for the uninterrupted production processes.
• The provider should have in-house well-equipped production facility and capabilities of designing and developing PCB to meet your future needs of outsourcing some of the parts from them.
• Good technical support and answering all the technical queries about its goods both before and after the sale of a product is an important aspect of a good component supplier.

Going through the stock and inventory of the suppliers will give you a fair idea about the caliber of the supplier. A large well-kept stock can prove to be a blessing for the smooth functioning of your production.

You can even go for an online search to find the reliable and reputed component providers. Check out the good deals on products and services offered by them. Narrow down the search to local vendors if need be. In order to find the trusted suppliers, you can refer to trade magazines.

Harry Krantz is among one of the best electronic component suppliers and obsolete electronic component distributors. To know more about their products and services, log on to www.harrykrantz.com

What To Look For In Military Equipment Suppliers?

Electronic gadgets and devices play a vital role in the working of every organization. Today’s warfare has become one of the most hi-tech organizations where the help of latest gadgets and equipments is sought. Many companies in the world spend huge amounts of money on investing in high-quality war equipments. When it comes to providing the equipments to the soldiers, nothing but the top-notch quality is the thing to consider.

In today’s hi-tech era, weapons are becoming more and more intelligent so are the military equipments. There are many military equipment suppliers but one should choose the one with huge stock of equipments. In a war, there is no space for errors, so it is diligent to settle down for the supplier that offers the premium quality of products.

Now days, the goal of these equipments is not only to provide protection to the soldiers but also to instill the boost in their confidence that they have the best with them. This gives them the energy and confidence to have an edge with the enemy. The latest technological advancements have led to a great rise in the range of products.

If you are thinking to select a supplier for military equipments, here are a few things to keep in mind:

• Choose the supplier who has a good reputation and has years of experience under the belt.

• Supplier with huge stock of miliary components should be considered. This ensures that you will get a timely delivery irrespective of your demand.

• Check for the components for their expiry. If the components have been lying for long time in the stock, they tend to expire and lose their efficacy.

• Make sure that they run quality parameters at regular intervals to check the performance of their components.

Having a good military equipment supplier by your side is no less than an asset. When safety and security are of paramount importance, it is important that you choose the one who deserves to be relied upon even in the oddest times.

Harry Krantz Company is a top military equipment supplier with a global presence. They have over 700,000 components of all types in stock, and are part of this business from last 7 decades. To know more about various other products and services they can offer besides military components, visit their website www.harrykrantz.com.

Are You Looking To Buy Obsolete Electronic Parts?

Electronics industry has made tremendous development in the past few decades. The pace at which the developments are taking place is faster than ever. As the new technologies develop, the older gets replaced. This is the reason that why many devices electronic components become obsolete.

Despite a plenty of reasons which make components obsolete, there are a number of devices and circulations that make use of obsolete electronics. This has lead to a constant demand of these components and a stock of these is kept by many electronic providers. Many of these components or electronics are hard to find and quite useful.

At times, to cope up with the rising demand for new products, manufacturers have to store the most recent products in demand at their stores. In order to hold and store the obsolete electronics, they put them under the category of excess inventory. This is sold to the companies who still use them for their electronic products.

A good electronics provider makes an extra effort to provide its customers with all the inventory items they have been looking for in the excess inventory. The items that compile up to form this excess inventory are purchased from the highly competent vendor base.

Before you choose a supplier for getting obsolete electronic products, make sure that your supplier passes all the stringent quality inspections for all the products. It is important to find the one with high commitment to quality to leave no space for errors. Many of these obsolete components are still vastly used in military and aerospace related programs and inspecting them for zero tolerance to errors is a must.

You can search online for the providers that are renowned and have experience in the field. You can discuss your trade requirements with their representatives and they will serve you with quality solution to all your requirements. Look for bargain deals without compromising on quality. Look for the one with huge stock inventory to meet your variety of needs. With your timely and extensive research, you will be able to zero down to the best one for you.

Harry Krantz Company is a top obsolete electronics supplier with a global presence. They have over 700,000 components of all types in stock, and are part of this business from last 7 decades. To know more about various other products and services they can offer besides military components, visit their website www.harrykrantz.com.

Top 10 Tips to distinguish a Genuine Components fake one

Finding a supplier of military components is not a difficult task but finding a genuine supplier is. Market is full of components suppliers who claim to supply authentic and top quality components which are used in military equipments. But it’s up to you to find out whether the supplier is actually a reliable and trustworthy one or not. It’s very important that the components that are to be used in military equipment should be sourced from a renowned and genuine supplier. Below are some points that needed to be considered before selecting a components supplier for your military equipment.
1. The supplier should adhere to all the regulations and quality standards set by the government.
2. The military component supplier you select should have a complete and vast stock of all type of components including the obsolete components.
3. Make sure the suppler can provide the same-day shipping facility.
4. It’s important that the supplier have a well set procedure for the up-keep and quality assurance of the stock they maintain.
5. The supplier must have international sourcing partners which can help in locating any type of component around the world. This can be a great plus while locating a hard to find or obsolete component.
6. All the military components supplied by them should comply with interface standards and design criteria standards.
7. The suppliers should possess a well-equipped search database in addition to the stocks maintained by them and allow the buyers with the facility of a 24/7 access to entire database of all type of components.
8. The suppliers should make sure that the products undergo a thorough checking before it is shiped to the customers.
9. The staff and technical team of the supplier should be highly qualified and experienced so that they can understand your requirements better.
10. Last but not the least, a good after sales service is imperative.
Harry Krantz Company is a top military electronic component distributor with a global presence. They have over 700,000 components of all types in stock, and are part of this business from last 7 decades. To know more about various other products and services they can offer besides military components, visit their website www.harrykrantz.com.

Why to Trust Only a Top supplier While Sourcing Military Com

Any equipment that is related to our safety and security has to be top notch and there can be no mistakes when it comes to the quality of such components. The importance of these components becomes bigger when it comes to the security of our country. Military components are a perfect example for this. To have an edge over the enemy in the battle field, its vital that the equipment of the soldiers are fitted with top of the line and high quality components that gives confidence to them as they take on the enemy. Therefore it is vital that any component that is to be fitted in the military equipment must be sourced from best component suppliers.
Military components need to be free from all defects as any snag in the component in battlefield can prove fatal for those in war zone. Also the component supplier has to be extremely reliable when it comes to the delivery of the components as delay can cost the nations dearly. It’s imperative that extreme care is to be taken while selecting a supplier and while purchasing the components. It has to be made sure that the supplier has an in-house quality assurance system that can ensure that the components delivered are of top quality and in best shape.
Only a big military component supplier of a high repute must be considered. Suppliers who are maintaining a huge stock of military components should be considered. Suppliers who maintain a big ready stock can provide a speedy and timely delivery. Many times the components that are lying for a long time develop problems or expire. So it’s very important to ensure that the components which are kept in stock are taken good care of and are checked for their quality and performance from time to time.
Harry Krantz Company is a top military electronic component distributor with a global presence. They have over 700,000 components of all types in stock, and are part of this business from last 7 decades. To know more about various other products and services they can offer besides military components, visit their website www.harrykrantz.com.
